text: Robert Francis "Bob" Skoronski (March 5, 1934 - October 30, 2018) was a former American football player. He was an tackle in the National Football League for the Green Bay Packers for eleven seasons in 1956 and again from 1959 to 1968. He was born in Ansonia, Connecticut. Skoronski died on October 30, 2018 of Alzheimer's disease in a suburb near Madison, Wisconsin at the age of 84.Former Green Bay Packers OL Bob Skoronski dies at 84 ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:Disease-related deaths in Wisconsin Category:Green Bay Packers players Category:American football offensive tackles Category:Sportspeople from Connecticut
title: Bob Skoronski
